title: Blaze
description:
I found answers, but my fight is only just beginning…
One of my guys has been kidnapped. I don’t know if the Anti Magick Alliance took him or if it was the Human Extinction League. But I do know I’ll do whatever it takes to get him back.My magick is growing stronger by the day. I can feel it surging beneath my skin. I just hope I can put thoughts of my past out of my head for long enough to focus on what needs to be done.Because even if I succeed in my rescue mission, there’s still the small question of evading prosecution for trying to burn my ex alive, figuring out how I’m supposed to save the world and who I’m supposed to save it from. Oh, and learning to navigate the four powerful mage boyfriends I’ve ended up with.Kole wants me but can’t get too close or he’ll want to devour me. Literally.Tanner knows what I need before I do.Mack won’t give in to what he wants because he’s the daddy of the group and should know better.And Luther can’t stand me.But we’re bound together. The five of us.The five of us plus… one more?‘Blaze’ is the second book in The Phoenix Prophecy series. It is a full-length paranormal reverse harem novel with graphic sexual content, sword-crossing, possible triggers, and a cliffhanger. It is aimed at readers 18+.
author: Cara Clare
